UPDATE `um_user` SET
`current_experience` = current_experience+#{currentExperience},
`current_red_envelops` = current_red_envelops+#{currentRedEnvelops},
`current_integral` = current_integral+#{currentIntegral},
`current_shop_ticket` =current_shop_ticket+ #{currentShopTicket},
`total_consume_money` =total_consume_money+ #{totalConsumeMoney},
`invite_people_num` =invite_people_num+ #{invitePeopleNum},
`total_red_envelops` =total_red_envelops+ #{currentRedEnvelops},
`total_integral` =total_integral+ #{currentIntegral},
`total_shop_ticket` =total_shop_ticket+ #{currentShopTicket},
`total_order` =total_order+ #{totalOrder},
id=#{id} WHERE `id` = #{id};

update um_user set
member_level_id=#{t.memberLevelId},
parent_id=#{t.parentId},
store_id=#{t.storeId}, commission_status=#{t.commissionStatus}, current_red_envelops=#{t.currentRedEnvelops}, current_integral=#{t.currentIntegral}, current_shop_ticket=#{t.currentShopTicket}, total_red_envelops=total_red_envelops+#{t.totalAddRedEnvelops}, total_integral=total_integral+#{t.totalAddIntegral}, total_shop_ticket=total_shop_ticket+#{t.totalAddShopTicket}, update_by=#{currentUserName} where id=#{t.id}

mapper.select:
SELECT u.id, u.phone, u.true_name, m.level_name, u.total_order, current_integral, total_red_envelops, total_consume_money, current_shop_ticket, total_shop_ticket, s.`name` storeName, u.parent_id parent, invite_people_num, recent_login_time, u.enabled, commission_status FROM um_user u INNER JOIN pm_member_level m ON u.member_level_id = m.id LEFT JOIN sm_store s ON u.store_id = s.id WHERE u.del_flag = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0 AND IF(s.del_flag is null, 1=1,s.del_flag = 0)
AND u.id = #{id}
AND u.phone LIKE concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
AND u.true_name LIKE concat('%', #{trueName}, '%')
AND m.level_name LIKE concat('%', #{levelName}, '%')
AND u.enabled = #{enabled}
AND s.NAME LIKE concat('%', #{storeName}, '%')

SELECT u1.photo, u1.NAME, CASE WHEN u1.sex IS NULL THEN '' WHEN u1.sex = 0 THEN '女' ELSE '男' END sex, IF ( u1.id_card IS NULL, 0, 1 ) isPass, u2.invite_code FROM um_user u1 LEFT JOIN um_user u2 ON u1.parent_id = u2.id WHERE u1.phone = #{phone}

SELECT u.photo, u.phone, m.actor, m.level_name, u.id, u.enabled, u.NAME, u.sex, u.login_times, u.invite_code, u.create_time, u.parent_id parentName, u.recent_login_time, u.store_id, u.commission_status, `current_experience`, `current_red_envelops`, `current_integral`, `current_shop_ticket`, `total_consume_money`, `invite_people_num`, `total_red_envelops`, `total_integral`, `total_shop_ticket`, `total_order` , IFNULL(m2.level_experience-current_experience,0) next_level_experience FROM um_user u INNER JOIN pm_member_level m ON u.member_level_id = m.id left join pm_member_level m2 ON m.level+1=m2.`level` WHERE u.id = #{id} and u.del_flag=0 and m.del_flag=0 and IF(m2.level_experience is null,m2.del_flag is null,m2.del_flag =0)

select IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(l.`name`),'') labelNames from um_user u,um_user_label l,um_rel_user_label ul where u.del_flag=0 and l.del_flag=0 and ul.del_flag=0 and u.id=ul.user_id and l.id=ul.user_label_id and u.id=#{id}

WITH RECURSIVE childrenIds (id,true_name,phone) AS ( SELECT id,true_name,phone FROM um_user WHERE del_flag=0 and parent_id=#{id} UNION ALL SELECT c.id,c.true_name,c.phone FROM childrenIds AS p JOIN um_user AS c ON p.id = c.parent_id where c.del_flag=0 ) SELECT id,true_name,phone FROM childrenIds

SELECT u.id, u.phone, u.true_name, u.name FROM um_user u WHERE u.del_flag = 0 and u.enabled = 1
AND u.id = #{id}
AND u.phone LIKE concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
AND u.true_name LIKE concat('%', #{trueName}, '%')
select id,phone,true_name,name from um_user where id in #{item, jdbcType=INTEGER}

WITH RECURSIVE childrenIds (id,store_id,parent_id) AS ( SELECT id,store_id,parent_id FROM um_user WHERE del_flag=0 and id=#{userId} UNION ALL SELECT c.id,c.store_id,c.parent_id FROM childrenIds AS p JOIN um_user AS c ON p.parent_id = c.id where c.del_flag=0 ) SELECT store_id FROM childrenIds where store_id is not null limit 1

WITH RECURSIVE temp (id,level,parent_id) AS ( SELECT u.id,m.level,u.parent_id FROM um_user u,pm_member_level m WHERE u.del_flag=0 and m.del_flag=0 and u.member_level_id=m.id and u.id=#{userId} UNION ALL SELECT u1.id,m1.level,u1.parent_id FROM um_user u1,pm_member_level m1,temp t WHERE u1.del_flag=0 and m1.del_flag=0 AND u1.member_level_id=m1.id and u1.id=t.parent_id
) SELECT u2.id userId,m2.level FROM um_user u2,pm_member_level m2 WHERE u2.del_flag=0 and m2.del_flag=0 and u2.member_level_id=m2.id and u2.parent_id=#{userId} UNION ALL SELECT id,level FROM temp
SELECT m.purchase_present FROM um_user u, pm_member_level m WHERE u.del_flag = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0 AND u.member_level_id = m.id AND u.id = #{userId}
select phone from um_user where del_flag=0
